pages.title: Iridium Alloy
pages.text: Iridium Alloy is an alloy made out of Advanced Alloy, Iridium and Diamond.$(br)An alternative to Archeosite, Iridium Alloy tools and armor are more durable and just as enchantable than their counterpart, but not as strong or lightweight.
Raw Iridium Alloy can only be crafted and is not naturally obtainable.
